original_text: Hey! Why are you shooting at our friends!?
zhtw: 嘿！為什麼要對我們的朋友開火啊！？

original_text: Hey Hey! That's one of ours!
zhtw: 嘿嘿！那是我們自己人啦！

original_text: Ah... I just hit a friendly...
zhtw: 啊啊……我居然打到自己人了……

original_text: It's not praiseworthy to shoot our own vehicles.
zhtw: 攻擊自家戰車可不是什麼值得誇耀的事。

original_text: Hey hey, don't shoot our friendly.
zhtw: 嘿嘿，別對自己人開火啊。

original_text: That's baad! Ammo rack got hit!
zhtw: 糟了！彈藥架被擊中了！

original_text: Mikaaa, the ammo rack is damaged!
zhtw: 米卡啊啊！彈藥架壞掉了！

original_text: Ammor rack hit? We need to avoid possible explosions.
zhtw: 彈藥架被擊中？得避免可能的爆炸。

original_text: Ammo rack hit? It might not survive the next one.
zhtw: 彈藥架被打中？下一次可能撐不住了。

original_text: Hey! That bounced!
zhtw: 嘿！那發彈跳掉了！

original_text: Sorry Mikko...
zhtw: 抱歉，米高……

original_text: But I hit that! Why it doesn't go through...?
zhtw: 我明明打中了！為什麼沒穿透啊……？

original_text: Eeh, we bounced that...
zhtw: 呃，我們的炮彈被彈開了……

original_text: Don't worry. You got the next one.
zhtw: 別擔心，下一次你會成功的。

original_text: Aki, aim for the thinner side next.
zhtw: 阿基，下次瞄準薄一點的地方。

original_text: Gotcha.
zhtw: 知道了！

original_text: That's a sturdy armor.
zhtw: 那裝甲真堅固。

original_text: Nice one Aki! That pierce through!
zhtw: 幹得好，阿基！那發穿透了！

original_text: Niice! Enemy armor penetrated!
zhtw: 太棒了！敵人裝甲被穿透了！

original_text: Penetration!
zhtw: 穿透了！

original_text: Not bad Aki. Better than Youko.
zhtw: 幹得不錯，阿基。比洋子還強。

original_text: Yes, this one was good.
zhtw: 嗯，這一擊很漂亮。

original_text: Nice, we penetrated them.
zhtw: 很好，我們穿透了他們。

original_text: Nice one Aki! That's a direct hit!
zhtw: 好樣的，阿基！那是直接命中！

original_text: Uhm... I think it's a direct it but...

original_text: Don't worry, this should be working.

original_text: Damn! That bounced!

original_text: That bounced. Not like I planned. But that's Sensha-do.

original_text: Mikaa, are you fine?

original_text: ...This one hurt a little.

original_text: After this one... I need a break...
zhtw: 挨了這一擊……我需要休息一下……

original_text: I felt this impact. But I can still go.
zhtw: 我感受到這次衝擊了。但我還能繼續。

original_text: Damn! We're done for!
zhtw: 該死！我們結束了！

original_text: We cannot fight anymore...
zhtw: 我們不能再戰鬥了……

original_text: We're done for. It happens when you ride tanks.

original_text: Everybody, do not forget this frustration.
zhtw: 所有人，別忘了這份挫敗感。

original_text: Battles are matter of fortune. Sometimes you lose even after giving all your best.

original_text: It's fine, it's still having effect.

original_text: Aah... We're done for.

original_text: True. But sometimes it's not all about surviving.
zhtw: 沒錯。但有時不只是為了生存。

original_text: Humans are creatures born to make mistakes. What's important is what you learn from that.
zhtw: 人類是天生會犯錯的生物。重要的是從中學到什麼。

original_text: In Sensha-do there are many times where you must keep going. But this is not one of those.
zhtw: 在戰車道中，很多時候你必須繼續前行。但這不是其中之一。
